main.name: World
main.description: `World` contains all the World managing functions, provided by a Worlds plugin.

children.name: getScene
children.description: Get the Scene with the given index/name.

arguments.name: identifier
arguments.description: The identifier of the Scene to get.

children.name: setCurrentScene
children.description: Set the current Scene to the Scene with the given identifier.

arguments.name: identifier
arguments.description: The identifier of the Scene, as passed to World.getScene().

children.name: addScene
children.description: Add the given Scene to the World

arguments.name: scene
arguments.description: The Scene to add to the Game.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the Scene. This name is considered more important than `Scene.name`.
